data.title: The Power of Love
data.meta_description: There are many different kinds of love. According to where you look, there are 3, 4, 7, 8, or 12 types of love, but we mostly hear about just three.
data.text:
Tomorrow is my wedding anniversary so my thoughts go to love - and to marriage. There are many different kinds of love. According to where you look, there are 3, 4, 7, 8, or 12 types of love, but we mostly hear about these three:

Agape — Unconditional Love. This one is hard for mere mortals. We like to think that God loves us unconditionally, and we hope that parents will love their children unconditionally.

Eros — Romantic Love. This seems to be hard for a lot of people to master, as well, but it is a topic that dominates advice columns, books, movies, and popular songs.

Philia — Affectionate Love, love between friends. The ancient Greeks thought this kind of love was better than eros (sexual love), because it represented love between people who considered themselves equals. This doesn't seem to be any easier than the other forms of love. Sadly, BFFs end up in plenty of toxic relationships.

The good news is that love works out quite beautifully, quite often.

Here are some lovely books (and a movie):

Amour DVD F AMO

Cyrano /McCaughrean, Geraldine. F MCC

Enchanted love: The mystical power of intimate relationships/Williamson, Marianne. 299.93 WIL

The five love languages : how to express heartfelt commitment to your mate /Chapman, Gary D., 646.78 CHA

If the Buddha dated : handbook for finding love on a spiritual path /Kasl, Charlotte Sophia, 294.3 KAS

Living happily ever after : couples talk about lasting love /Wagner, Laurie, 646.78 WAG

Major Pettigrew's last stand : a novel /Simonson, Helen. F SI

Symbols of love 302.3 SYM

Us : Americans talk about love /305.3 BOW

When love lasts forever: male couples celebrate commitment/Yost, Merle James. 306.76 YOS

The force of kindness : change your life with love & compassion /Salzberg, Sharon. 294.356 SAL

Guess how much I love you /McBratney, Sam. E MCB

How to love /Nhat Hanh, 294.3 NHA

If Jesus is Lord : loving our enemies in an age of violence /Sider, Ronald J., 241.697 SID

Outrageous love : a love that seeks no reward /Walsh, Sheila, 231.6 WAL

God of the sparrow /Vajda, Jaroslav J., E VAJ

The power of love : sermons, reflections, and wisdom to uplift and inspire /Curry, Michael B., 252.03 CUR

"First comes love and then comes marriage" (sometimes)

As for me and my house : crafting your marriage to last /Wangerin, Walter. 248.8 WAN

Committed : a skeptic makes peace with marriage /Gilbert, Elizabeth, B GIL

Love's revolution : interracial marriage /Root, Maria P. 306.846 ROO

An American marriage : a novel /Jones, Tayari, F JON

Passionate marriage : love, sex, and intimacy in emotionally committed relationships /Schnarch, David Morris, 616.89 SCH

Toward commitment : a dialogue about marriage /Rehm, Diane. 306.81 REH

Wedded bliss : the marriage of art and ceremony /Peabody Essex Museum. 395 RIC

Weddings from the heart : contemporary and traditional ceremonies for an unforgettable wedding /Kingma, Daphne Rose. 392.5 KIN
